item.title: Phillip Phillips - Gone, Gone, Gone - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulule Play-Along I raised the pitch of the song up a half-step. The chord names sound very complicated but they aren't. Check out the beginning of the video to see how they are so closely related. It's really interesting! Strumming and picking suggestions provided.
I do not own the copyright to this music. Video is for educational and instructional purposes

item.title: Phillip Phillips - Home - Key of C
item.description:
Chords = F, C, Am, G but there are some fast changes! I've included optional picking for the beginning. ***See this link for a version of the video that is 10% slower to make it easier to work on the picking: https://youtu.be/mlmcXeGuHB4
Check out the website for the ukulele jam sessions I run via Fredonia Ukulele: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.e...
Check out my website for music teachers: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.e...
